alert.note: Alert for Custer; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Treasure (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 6:45PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Big Horn, southwestern Custer, northern Powder River, northeastern Yellowstone, Rosebud and Treasure Counties through 730 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Melstone to 13 miles southwest of Ashland. Little rain or lightning is expected, but a strong outflow ahead of the storms is occurring. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Colstrip, Forsyth, Broadus, Hysham, Custer, Lame Deer, Busby, Ashland, Rosebud, Birney, Bighorn, Ingomar, Cartersville, Birney Village, Olive, Vananda, Sonnette, Brandenberg, Kirby, and Muddy Cluster. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Custer; Northeastern Yellowstone; Northern Big Horn; Northern Rosebud; Powder River; Southern Big Horn; Southern Rosebud; Treasure
